languages.text: "Говорят, что {name} фон Валанциус свят{mf|ой|ая}. Стоило {mf|ему|ей} прийти к власти, как чистейший родник излился из статуи Императора и до сих пор не иссяк! Что это, если не чудо?"

traits.locale_text: "Говорят, что {name} фон Валанциус свят{mf|ой|ая}. Стоило {mf|ему|ей} прийти к власти, как чистейший родник забил из под статуи самого Императора! Что это, если не чудо?"

languages.text: "They say {name} von Valancius is a saint. As soon as {mf|he|she} came to power, a spring of the purest water poured forth from the Emperor's statue, and it hasn't run dry to this day! What is that if not a miracle?"
languages.original_text: "Говорят, что {name} фон Валанциус свят{mf|ой|ая}. Стоило {mf|ему|ей} прийти к власти, как чистейший родник излился из статуи Императора и до сих пор не иссяк! Что это, если не чудо?"

traits.locale_text: "They say {name} von Valancius is a saint. As soon as {mf|he|she} came to power, a spring of the purest water poured forth from the Emperor's statue, and hasn't run dry to this day! What is it if not a miracle?"

"They say {name} von Valancius is a saint. As soon as {mf|he|she} came to power, a spring of the purest water poured forth from the Emperor's statue, and hasn't run dry to this day! What is it if not a miracle?"

"They say {name} von Valancius is a saint. As soon as {mf|he|she} came to power, a spring of the purest water poured forth from the Emperor's statue, and hasn't run dry to this day! What is it if not a miracle?"

"They say {name} von Valancius is a saint. As soon as {mf|he|she} came to power, a spring of the purest water poured forth from the Emperor's statue, and it hasn't run dry to this day! What is that if not a miracle?"

"They say {name} von Valancius is a saint. As soon as {mf|he|she} came to power, a spring of the purest water poured forth from the Emperor's statue, and it hasn't run dry to this day! What is that if not a miracle?"

languages.text: “大家都说{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯是位圣人。{mf|他|她}刚刚上台，帝皇雕像就涌出了甘甜的泉水，直到现在都没有干涸！这不是奇迹还能是什么？”
languages.original_text: "They say {name} von Valancius is a saint. As soon as {mf|he|she} came to power, a spring of the purest water poured forth from the Emperor's statue, and it hasn't run dry to this day! What is that if not a miracle?"

traits.locale_text: “大家都说{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯是位圣人。{mf|他|她}刚刚上台，帝皇雕像就涌出了甘甜的泉水，直到现在都没有干涸！这不是奇迹还能是什么？”

languages.text: 「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは聖人だと言われている。あの方が権力を得た時、皇帝の像から透き通った水が溢れ出ました。それ以来、その泉は流れ続けています！これが奇跡でないなら、なんだと言うのですか？」
languages.original_text: "They say {name} von Valancius is a saint. As soon as {mf|he|she} came to power, a spring of the purest water poured forth from the Emperor's statue, and it hasn't run dry to this day! What is that if not a miracle?"

traits.locale_text: 「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは聖人だと言われている。あの方が権力を得た時、皇帝の像から透き通った水が溢れ出ました。それ以来、その泉は流れ続けています！これが奇跡でないなら、なんだと言うのですか？」

languages.text: «Dicen que {name} von Valancius es un{mf||a} sant{mf|o|a}. Fue llegar al poder y un manantial de agua pura brotó de la estatua del Emperador, ¡y a día de hoy aún no se ha secado! ¿No es un milagro?».
languages.original_text: "They say {name} von Valancius is a saint. As soon as {mf|he|she} came to power, a spring of the purest water poured forth from the Emperor's statue, and it hasn't run dry to this day! What is that if not a miracle?"

traits.locale_text: «Dicen que {name} von Valancius es un{mf||a} sant{mf|o|a}. Fue llegar al poder y un manantial de agua pura brotó de la estatua del Emperador, ¡y a día de hoy aún no se ha secado! ¿No es un milagro?».

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius soll {mf|ein Heiliger|eine Heilige} sein. Kaum ist {mf|er|sie} an die Macht gekommen, ist aus der Statue des Imperators ein Brunnen reinsten Wassers gequollen, und er ist bis heute nicht versiegt! Was soll das sein, wenn kein Wunder?"
languages.original_text: "They say {name} von Valancius is a saint. As soon as {mf|he|she} came to power, a spring of the purest water poured forth from the Emperor's statue, and it hasn't run dry to this day! What is that if not a miracle?"

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius soll {mf|ein Heiliger|eine Heilige} sein. Kaum ist {mf|er|sie} an die Macht gekommen, ist aus der Statue des Imperators ein Brunnen reinsten Wassers gequollen, und er ist bis heute nicht versiegt! Was soll das sein, wenn kein Wunder?"

languages.text: « On dit que {name} von Valancius est {mf|un saint|une sainte}. Le jour où {mf|il|elle} est {mf|arrivé|arrivée} au pouvoir, de l'eau pure a jailli de la statue de l'Empereur et sa source n'est toujours pas tarie ! C'est un véritable miracle ! »
languages.original_text: "They say {name} von Valancius is a saint. As soon as {mf|he|she} came to power, a spring of the purest water poured forth from the Emperor's statue, and it hasn't run dry to this day! What is that if not a miracle?"

traits.locale_text: « On dit que {name} von Valancius est {mf|un saint|une sainte}. Le jour où {mf|il|elle} est {mf|arrivé|arrivée} au pouvoir, de l'eau pure a jailli de la statue de l'Empereur et sa source n'est toujours pas tarie ! C'est un véritable miracle ! »

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius'un aziz olduğunu söylüyorlar. Başa geçer geçmez İmparator'un heykelinden suların en safı akmaya başladı, bugüne değin de kurumadı! Bu mucize değildir de nedir?"
languages.original_text: "They say {name} von Valancius is a saint. As soon as {mf|he|she} came to power, a spring of the purest water poured forth from the Emperor's statue, and it hasn't run dry to this day! What is that if not a miracle?"

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius'un bir aziz olduğunu söylüyorlar. Başa geçer geçmez İmparator'un heykelinden suların en safı akmaya başladı ve bugüne değin de kurumadı! Bu bir mucize değildir de nedir?"
